mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblStandardResult ( PRIPID, ENTNAME, RESULT_NUM, RESULT_TYPE, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{pripid}, #{entName}, #{resultNum}, #{resultType}, #{updateTime} )

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO tblStandardResult ( PRIPID, ENTNAME, RESULT_NUM, RESULT_TYPE, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{item.pripid}, #{item.entName}, #{item.resultNum}, #{item.resultType}, #{item.updateTime} )
